code: import*as api from"../api";import{FETCH_ALL}from"../constants/actionTypes";export const getItems=params=>async dispatch=>{try{const data=await api.getItems(params);dispatch({type:FETCH_ALL,payload:data.data});}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const addItems=(formData,history)=>async()=>{try{await api.addItems(formData);history('/');}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
